stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

stadium.name: The High-Pass Pitch
stadium.description: A field built at a breathtaking altitude in a fortified mountain pass. The air is painfully thin, and the weather is dangerously unpredictable.

stats.pregame_ritual: Tying a small, hand-carved wooden bird to their gear.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Exchanging well-wishes with their direct opponent before the game starts.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.

preGame:
## üéôÔ∏è BATTEN DOWN THE HATCHES, OSTERRA! IT'S ELIMINATION TIME! üéôÔ∏è

Step right up and feast your eyes on the linear lunacy of Tuesday Night Trollball! This is your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from **The Unruly Yard** in the heart of New Monteforte! We are deep in the **Losers Bracket Playoffs**, and folks, the tension is thicker than the grease on one of Cyfnerth the Butcher‚Äôs recycled meat pies! This is Game 4 of our Best of 5 series. The Oread's Summit Tamers are holding onto a 2-1 lead, meaning the Chaos Creatures are backed into a corner with their tails between their legs! 

The atmosphere here is positively toxic‚Äîand I love it! The crowd is already throwing stones at the players, and the scaffolding is creaking under the weight of fans who clearly didn't pay for their tickets. I can see **Lian Denton** down there, chugging a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup! That‚Äôs the kind of high-octane fuel you need when your life is on the line! Meanwhile, **Swamy Ahasuerus** for the Tamers is dipping her hands in ice-cold well water. She‚Äôs going to need that chill when the Monteforte fans start lighting the bleachers on fire!

With both teams sitting at the bottom of the popularity polls, this isn't about the fame‚Äîit's about the pure, unadulterated joy of smashing a leather troll head into a basket! The Chaos Creatures might have the home-field advantage with their rowdy street performers and hostile locals, but the Tamers are accustomed to the thin air of the peaks. Will the urban decay of Monteforte be enough to stop the mountain-dwellers from clinching the series? Grab your gear and keep your heads down, folks, because the whistle is about to blow and the carnage is about to commence! While 'heroes' like Sir Tanos are probably off polishing their shiny armor and avoiding real work, these players are ready to get their hands dirty! üõ°Ô∏è‚ö°üèà
postGame:
### üèüÔ∏è CITY LIMITS CARNAGE! THE SERIES IS TIED! üèüÔ∏è

What a grand display of urban warfare we just witnessed at The Unruly Yard! If you like your sports with a side of internal bleeding and desperate comebacks, this was the match for you! The New Monteforte Chaos Creatures have defended their turf with a 2-0 shutout over the Oread's Summit Tamers, forcing a Game 5 and sending this series into a fever pitch! It was a game defined by two things: absolute defensive stalemates and the kind of bone-shattering violence that would make even Geth the Gravelord blush! üíÄ

The action ignited early with a frantic scramble for the ball in Center Field. **Alben Diantha** snagged the head first, but the opening minutes were a mess of fumbles and dropped passes. **Fogel Raynold** tried to feed **Gabriele Klehm**, but the ball hit the dirt like a lead weight. It was as if the players were as confused as Sir Artorias trying to find his way out of a paper bag! 

But then, the real fun started‚Äîthe violence! **Wolbrom Ariella** decided that **Mitran Mariand** had been standing for far too long, delivering a tackle that sent the Tamer to the dirt with a sickening thud! **INJURED!** The crowd roared, the scaffolding shook, and I think I saw a street performer juggle some knives in celebration! Not to be outdone, **Zadoc Wyatan** retaliated for the Tamers by absolutely leveling **Urata Oriana**, sending the Chaos Creature to the healer's tent before the halftime whistle even blew! üè•

Halftime saw both teams retreating to their corners, probably nursing bruises larger than Chairman Toland‚Äôs cheese collection. When they returned, the score was still 0-0, but the intensity had shifted! **Placido Kora** took possession early in the second half, and the Chaos Creatures finally looked like they had a plan that didn't involve just hitting people‚Äîthough they kept doing that too! **Saloma Talich** showed some mountain-bred aggression by taking out **Mouldon Earl**, leaving him crumpled on the graffiti-covered pitch.

Then came the play of the game! **Tucker Hett**, showing more focus than a money priest at a debt collection, found an opening in Center Field. Instead of running into the teeth of the defense, she wound up and launched a massive **SHOOT**! The troll head sailed through the air and cleared the goal for a spectacular **TWO POINTS!** üéØ The Yard went into a full-blown riot! The Tamers looked stunned, like they‚Äôd just been told Sir Tanos was their new life coach!

Desperate to get back into the game, the Tamers ramped up the brutality. **Saloma Talich** was on a warpath, taking out **Wolbrom Ariella** with a hit that likely rattled his ancestors! Then **Alwyn Wandy** got in on the action, injuring **Boulanger Procto** with a tackle that was more of a professional mugging! It was a beautiful sight, bodies hitting the dirt like discarded scrap from the Guild of the Black Sky!

But the Chaos Creatures' defense held firm like the walls of a dungeon! Even with the Tamers trying to clear the field, they couldn't find the basket. **Zadoc Wyatan** managed to injure **Alben Diantha**, but the Tamers' offense was sputtering like a broken steam engine from Confluence. They were dropping the ball more often than the White Ravens drop their sense of morality!

In the closing moments, the Tamers tried one last desperate pass. **Saloma Talich** launched a wild throw, looking for anyone in a mountain jersey, but **Urata Oriana**‚Äîwho had returned from his earlier injury‚Äîleaped into the air and **INTERCEPTED** the ball! He snagged it right out of the sky, effectively ending any hope the Tamers had of a late-game miracle. It was a defensive masterclass that would make Nikos Thanae jealous!

So there you have it, fans! The final score: **Chaos Creatures 2, Tamers 0**. This series is now deadlocked at 2-2! The New Monteforte squad has shown that you can't count out the city rats when their backs are against the wall. The Oread's Summit crew looked a bit winded down here at sea level‚Äîmaybe they missed the thin air and the vertigo of the High-Pass Pitch!

Next week, it all comes down to Game 5! One team moves on, and the other is sent home to cry to their respective gods. I‚Äôll be there, hopefully with a front-row seat to more catastrophic injuries! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off from the most beautiful, brutal game in Osterra! Keep your weapons sharp and your healers closer! üõ°Ô∏èüíÄüî•
